4.8 Summary
In this lesson, you discovered how you can re-frame your time series prediction problem as a
supervised learning problem for use with machine learning methods. Speciﬁcally, you learned:
 Supervised learning is the most popular way of framing problems for machine learning as
a collection of observations with inputs and outputs.
